name: James E. DZURENDA, Commissioner, Connecticut Department of Correction, petitioner, v. Odilio GONZALEZ; and James E. Dzurenda, Commissioner, Connecticut Department of Correction, petitioner, v. Jourdan E. Huertas.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:

v.
Odilio GONZALEZ; and James E. Dzurenda, Commissioner, Connecticut Department of Correction, petitioner,

attorneys: Motions of respondents for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Connecticut denied.
casebody.head_matter:
James E. DZURENDA, Commissioner, Connecticut Department of Correction, petitioner,
v.
Odilio GONZALEZ; and James E. Dzurenda, Commissioner, Connecticut Department of Correction, petitioner,
v.
Jourdan E. Huertas.
No. 13-204.
Supreme Court of the United States
Nov. 18, 2013.
Case below, 308 Conn. 463, 68 A.3d 624.
Motions of respondents for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Connecticut denied.
